list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: risk something, usually a sum of money, against someone else's on the basis of the outcome of a future event, such as the result of a race or game.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I bet this place is really spooky late at night
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi cá là nơi này thực sự hư hỏng vào đêm khuya

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of risking a sum of money on the outcome of a future event.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: every Saturday she had a bet on the horses
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mỗi thứ bảy cô đặt cược vào những con ngựa
